comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: U.S. Ambassador to Belgium, 1914-1921, probably shown here returning to Europe following his "nervous attack" which sent him back to the U.S. in November, 1915 for rest and recuperation. See notes under

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: artolog: Thanks for the comments on this and the other photos of Whitlock. We will add more details to the records.
